text: Then a champion named Goliath, who was from Gath, came out from the Philistine camp. He was six cubits and a span in height,17:4 Goliath was approximately 9 feet 9 inches or 297 centimeters tall; LXX, DSS, and Josephus four cubits and a span in height (approximately 6 feet 9 inches or 206 centimeters tall).
